Question: String to byte convertion in java: :i m new in java....i m trying to read a text file using file input stream. i m reading text line by line and set as a string.. now i want to convert string into byte. but i m getting a number format exception.. please help me to solve this problem.FileInputStream fstream = new FileInputStream("C:/Users/data.txt");          DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(fstream);          BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in));          byte[] bytes = null;          String str;          int i=0;          while ((str = br.readLine()) != null)           {              bytes[i] = Byte.parseByte(str,16);              i++;          }          in.close();
Please using this api: String.getBytes.
Answer:
response:
String to byte convertion in java: :i m new in java....i m trying to read a text file using file input stream. i m reading text line by line and set as a string.. now i want to convert string into byte. but i m getting a number format exception.. please help me to solve this problem.FileInputStream fstream = new FileInputStream("C:/Users/data.txt");          DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(fstream);          BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in));          byte[] bytes = null;          String str;          int i=0;          while ((str = br.readLine()) != null)           {              bytes[i] = Byte.parseByte(str,16);              i++;          }          in.close();
